tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MealPlan (
  meal_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  meal_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  meal_date DATE NOT NULL,
  meal_description VARCHAR(255),
  dietary_restriction VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE meal_plans (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  meal_name VARCHAR(100),
  ingredients TEXT,
  dietary_restrictions VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE shopping_lists (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  items TEXT,
  total_price NUMERIC(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  dietary_restrictions VARCHAR(100),
  preferred_meal VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE meal_list_relations (
  meal_id INT,
  list_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (meal_id, list_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (meal_id) REFERENCES meal_plans(meal_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (list_id) REFERENCES shopping_lists(list_id)
);
